thread.title: Claudia Gomez
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Claudia Gomez

author: Claudia Gomez
title: Claudia Gomez
text: We were treated with courtesy and respect, fully informed on all options, regarding storage unit size and specials in order to meet our needs. The staff were sincere in putting our needs first and not just making a sale. I would recommend public storage, without a second thought.
